pages.text: $(italic)You've already used your anvil - or much more anvils - plenty. However, both $(l:general/anvil_crushing)Anvil Crushing$(/l) and repairing and enchanting tools always damage them so quickly that they become irreparably damaged.$(br)To make the anvil more stable - or even indestructible - you need a harder material.

The Bedrock Anvil allows you to rename items at no additional cost. In addition, you can also add descriptions to your items.$(br2)Additionally, of course an anvil made of Bedrock has a distinct advantage over normal anvils:$(br)It is indestructible, making it a perfect candidate for usage in $(l:general/anvil_crushing)Anvil Crushing$() automation or mass enchantment actions.
